channel.title: Ballscape
channel.description:
Hello !
I would like to create remake of an old server called Ballscape. Im looking for coder to do following things.
Fix all the bugs and glitches Create a webclient Create dicing Add custom item "Mystery Box" Add slayer points, donator points Highscores Create random event Something easy more Leave me a message on here, or add me on skype "lilabdi56" Source you will be working on (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=482590.0)
If moparscape link is forbidden then http://www.upload.ee/files/1201916/ballscapev4.rar.html

item.title: Ballscape
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you want to create a development team, then please create a topic in this board. However, before you do that, please put a little bit more of an effort into your topic. Try and explain where you want to go with the server, why they should join, some pictures if you have any, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Ballscape
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well development teams if anything because it looks like you want a programmer for your server but I’d suggest you make your topic nicer and more professional to get a developer

Read full topic
